title: Leading trailers in the U.S. January 2020 , by weekly TV ad spend
summary: In general Spending in million U.S. dollars has fallen over the Year.
Spending in million U.S. dollars is slightly decreasing from 1917 to Just_Mercy.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 1917 and Bad_Boys_for_Life.
Maximum Spending in million U.S. dollars, about 10.41 was reported at Year 1917
Minimum Spending in million U.S. dollars about 3.72 was reached at Year Just_Mercy
